message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that's worth a lot to me. I'm offering it to you for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget, but $8000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $12000 to make this work. It's still a great deal for a product of this value.  Let's find a way to bridge the gap.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to go above $8000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
